posts.message:
do yourself a favor and use LAUNCHY.
an extremely smart and productive launcher for Windows, Mac and linux.
it saves me a lot of strokes everyday :) 
http://www.launchy.net/
posts.caption: www.launchy.net
posts.description: Launchy is a free cross-platform utility designed to help you forget about your start menu, the icons on your desktop, and even your file manager.
